description: This Java class configures auditing in a Spring application by implementing the AuditorAware interface to provide the current auditor's identifier, defaulting to 'SYSTEM_USER' if no authentication ID is available.

classes.name: AuditorAwareConfig
classes.description: A Spring configuration class that provides current auditor information for auditing purposes.

methods.name: getCurrentAuditor
methods.description: Returns an Optional containing the current auditor ID; defaults to 'SYSTEM_USER' when no auth ID is available.
